cleaned_text: These are premium quality real natural carnelian crystal towers. These are NOT just red agate or "carnelian colored" like so many other online listings are. All of our carnelian products are 100% real carnelian. We are so certain as to the authenticity, quality, and value of our natural crystals given that we source directly so there are no middlemen to misrepresent the product to us (Such as at the many crystal shows most shops buy from where the vendors disappear the next day). We are our own wholesaler! Various High Quality Natural Crystals available, use the selector to see the photo of your choice.
